p1: To protect you from fraud we need to send an invitation code by post to your home address.

list1.p: You can request a code if you:
list1.li1: will reach State Pension age in the next 3 months
list1.li2: have not received your code or have lost it

p2: You should receive your invitation code within 5 days of requesting it. You can then return to GOV.UK to get your State Pension.
